verses.text: <div type="x-milestone" subType="x-preverse" sID="pv2899"/><div sID="gen8358" type="section"/> <title>The <divineName>Lord</divineName> Is My Shepherd</title> <title canonical="true" type="psalm">A <w lemma="strong:H04210">Psalm</w> of <w lemma="strong:H01732">David</w>.</title> <lg sID="gen8359"/> <div type="x-milestone" subType="x-preverse" eID="pv2899"/> <l level="1" sID="gen8360"/>The <divineName><w lemma="strong:H03068">Lord</w></divineName> is my <note n="d" osisID="Ps.23.1!crossReference.d" osisRef="Ps.23.1" type="crossReference"><reference osisRef="Ps.78.52">Ps. 78:52</reference>; <reference osisRef="Ps.80.1">80:1</reference>; <reference osisRef="Isa.40.11">Isa. 40:11</reference>; <reference osisRef="Jer.31.10">Jer. 31:10</reference>; <reference osisRef="Ezek.34.11-Ezek.34.12">Ezek. 34:11, 12</reference>, <reference osisRef="Ezek.34.23">23</reference>; <reference osisRef="John.10.11">John 10:11</reference>; <reference osisRef="Heb.13.20">Heb. 13:20</reference>; <reference osisRef="1Pet.2.25">1 Pet. 2:25</reference>; <reference osisRef="1Pet.5.4">5:4</reference></note><w lemma="strong:H07462">shepherd</w>; I shall <w lemma="strong:H03808">not</w> <note n="e" osisID="Ps.23.1!crossReference.e" osisRef="Ps.23.1" type="crossReference"><reference osisRef="Ps.34.9-Ps.34.10">Ps. 34:9, 10</reference>; [<reference osisRef="Matt.6.33">Matt. 6:33</reference>]</note><w lemma="strong:H02637">want</w>.<l eID="gen8360" level="1"/>

<l level="2" sID="gen8361"/>He makes me <w lemma="strong:H07257">lie down</w> in <w lemma="strong:H01877">green</w> <note n="f" osisID="Ps.23.2!crossReference.f" osisRef="Ps.23.2" type="crossReference"><reference osisRef="Ezek.34.14">Ezek. 34:14</reference>; <reference osisRef="John.10.9">John 10:9</reference></note><w lemma="strong:H04999">pastures</w>.<l eID="gen8361" level="2"/> <l level="1" sID="gen8362"/>He <w lemma="strong:H05095">leads</w> me <w lemma="strong:H05921">beside</w> <w lemma="strong:H04496">still</w> <w lemma="strong:H04325">waters</w>.<note n="1" osisID="Ps.23.2!note.1" osisRef="Ps.23.2" subType="x-original" type="translation">Hebrew <hi type="italic"><catchWord>beside</catchWord> waters of rest</hi></note><l eID="gen8362" level="1"/>

<l level="2" sID="gen8363"/>He <note n="g" osisID="Ps.23.3!crossReference.g" osisRef="Ps.23.3" type="crossReference"><reference osisRef="Ps.19.7">Ps. 19:7</reference></note><w lemma="strong:H07725">restores</w> my <w lemma="strong:H05315">soul</w>.<l eID="gen8363" level="2"/> <l level="1" sID="gen8364"/>He <note n="h" osisID="Ps.23.3!crossReference.h" osisRef="Ps.23.3" type="crossReference"><reference osisRef="Ps.5.8">Ps. 5:8</reference>; <reference osisRef="Ps.31.3">31:3</reference>; <reference osisRef="Ps.139.10">139:10</reference>, <reference osisRef="Ps.139.24">24</reference>; <reference osisRef="Ps.143.10">143:10</reference>; <reference osisRef="Isa.40.11">Isa. 40:11</reference>; <reference osisRef="Isa.49.10">49:10</reference></note><w lemma="strong:H05148">leads</w> me in <note n="i" osisID="Ps.23.3!crossReference.i" osisRef="Ps.23.3" type="crossReference"><reference osisRef="Prov.4.11">Prov. 4:11</reference>; <reference osisRef="Prov.8.20">8:20</reference></note><w lemma="strong:H04570">paths</w> of <w lemma="strong:H06664">righteousness</w><note n="1" osisID="Ps.23.3!note.1" osisRef="Ps.23.3" type="alternative">Or <hi type="italic"><catchWord>in</catchWord> right paths</hi></note><l eID="gen8364" level="1"/> <l level="2" sID="gen8365"/><w lemma="strong:H04616">for</w> his <note n="j" osisID="Ps.23.3!crossReference.j" osisRef="Ps.23.3" type="crossReference"><reference osisRef="Ps.25.11">Ps. 25:11</reference>; <reference osisRef="Ps.31.3">31:3</reference>; <reference osisRef="Ps.79.9">79:9</reference>; <reference osisRef="Ps.109.21">109:21</reference>; <reference osisRef="Ezek.20.9">Ezek. 20:9</reference>, <reference osisRef="Ezek.20.14">14</reference></note><w lemma="strong:H08034">nameâ€™s</w> sake.<l eID="gen8365" level="2"/>  <lg eID="gen8359"/>

<div type="x-milestone" subType="x-preverse" sID="pv2900"/><lg sID="gen8366"/> <div type="x-milestone" subType="x-preverse" eID="pv2900"/> <l level="1" sID="gen8367"/><w lemma="strong:H01571">Even</w> though I <note n="k" osisID="Ps.23.4!crossReference.k" osisRef="Ps.23.4" type="crossReference"><reference osisRef="Ps.138.7">Ps. 138:7</reference></note><w lemma="strong:H03212">walk</w> through the <w lemma="strong:H01516">valley</w> of <note n="l" osisID="Ps.23.4!crossReference.l" osisRef="Ps.23.4" type="crossReference">See <reference osisRef="Job.3.5">Job 3:5</reference></note>the <w lemma="strong:H06757">shadow of death</w>,<note n="1" osisID="Ps.23.4!note.1" osisRef="Ps.23.4" type="alternative">Or <hi type="italic"><catchWord>the valley of</catchWord> deep darkness</hi></note><l eID="gen8367" level="1"/> <l level="2" sID="gen8368"/>I will <note n="m" osisID="Ps.23.4!crossReference.m" osisRef="Ps.23.4" type="crossReference"><reference osisRef="Ps.3.6">Ps. 3:6</reference>; <reference osisRef="Ps.27.1">27:1</reference>, <reference osisRef="Ps.27.3">3</reference>; <reference osisRef="Ps.118.6">118:6</reference></note><w lemma="strong:H03372">fear</w> <w lemma="strong:H03808">no</w> <w lemma="strong:H07451">evil</w>,<l eID="gen8368" level="2"/> <l level="1" sID="gen8369"/><w lemma="strong:H03588">for</w> <note n="n" osisID="Ps.23.4!crossReference.n" osisRef="Ps.23.4" type="crossReference"><reference osisRef="Exod.3.12">Ex. 3:12</reference>; <reference osisRef="Isa.43.2">Isa. 43:2</reference></note>you are <w lemma="strong:H05978">with</w> me;<l eID="gen8369" level="1"/> <l level="2" sID="gen8370"/>your <note n="o" osisID="Ps.23.4!crossReference.o" osisRef="Ps.23.4" type="crossReference"><reference osisRef="Mic.7.14">Mic. 7:14</reference></note><w lemma="strong:H07626">rod</w> and your <w lemma="strong:H04938">staff</w>,<l eID="gen8370" level="2"/> <l level="2" sID="gen8371"/>they <w lemma="strong:H05162">comfort</w> me.<l eID="gen8371" level="2"/>  <lg eID="gen8366"/>

<div type="x-milestone" subType="x-preverse" sID="pv2901"/><lg sID="gen8372"/> <div type="x-milestone" subType="x-preverse" eID="pv2901"/> <l level="1" sID="gen8373"/>You <note n="p" osisID="Ps.23.5!crossReference.p" osisRef="Ps.23.5" type="crossReference"><reference osisRef="Ps.78.19">Ps. 78:19</reference>; [<reference osisRef="Prov.9.2">Prov. 9:2</reference>; <reference osisRef="John.6.51">John 6:51</reference>]; See <reference osisRef="2Sam.17.27-2Sam.17.29">2 Sam. 17:27-29</reference></note><w lemma="strong:H06186">prepare</w> a <w lemma="strong:H07979">table</w> <w lemma="strong:H06440">before</w> me<l eID="gen8373" level="1"/> <l level="2" sID="gen8374"/>in <note n="q" osisID="Ps.23.5!crossReference.q" osisRef="Ps.23.5" type="crossReference">[<reference osisRef="Ps.31.19">Ps. 31:19</reference>]</note>the <w lemma="strong:H05048">presence</w> of my <w lemma="strong:H06887">enemies</w>;<l eID="gen8374" level="2"/> <l level="1" sID="gen8375"/>you <note n="r" osisID="Ps.23.5!crossReference.r" osisRef="Ps.23.5" type="crossReference"><reference osisRef="Ps.45.7">Ps. 45:7</reference>; <reference osisRef="Ps.133.2">133:2</reference>; <reference osisRef="Luke.7.46">Luke 7:46</reference>; [<reference osisRef="Ps.92.10">Ps. 92:10</reference>]</note><w lemma="strong:H01878">anoint</w> my <w lemma="strong:H07218">head</w> with <w lemma="strong:H08081">oil</w>;<l eID="gen8375" level="1"/> <l level="2" sID="gen8376"/>my <note n="s" osisID="Ps.23.5!crossReference.s" osisRef="Ps.23.5" type="crossReference"><reference osisRef="Ps.16.5">Ps. 16:5</reference></note><w lemma="strong:H03563">cup</w> <w lemma="strong:H07310">overflows</w>.<l eID="gen8376" level="2"/>

<l level="1" sID="gen8377"/><w lemma="strong:H0389">Surely</w><note n="1" osisID="Ps.23.6!note.1" osisRef="Ps.23.6" type="alternative">Or <hi type="italic">Only</hi></note> <w lemma="strong:H02896">goodness</w> and <w lemma="strong:H02617">mercy</w><note n="2" osisID="Ps.23.6!note.2" osisRef="Ps.23.6" type="alternative">Or <hi type="italic">steadfast love</hi></note> shall <w lemma="strong:H07291">follow</w> me<l eID="gen8377" level="1"/> <l level="2" sID="gen8378"/><w lemma="strong:H03605">all</w> the <w lemma="strong:H03117">days</w> of my <w lemma="strong:H02416">life</w>,<l eID="gen8378" level="2"/> <l level="1" sID="gen8379"/>and I shall <note n="t" osisID="Ps.23.6!crossReference.t" osisRef="Ps.23.6" type="crossReference"><reference osisRef="Ps.27.4">Ps. 27:4</reference></note><w lemma="strong:H03427">dwell</w><note n="3" osisID="Ps.23.6!note.3" osisRef="Ps.23.6" type="alternative">Or <hi type="italic"><catchWord>shall</catchWord> return to dwell</hi></note> in the <w lemma="strong:H01004">house</w> of the <divineName><w lemma="strong:H03068">Lord</w></divineName><l eID="gen8379" level="1"/> <l level="2" sID="gen8380"/><note n="u" osisID="Ps.23.6!crossReference.u" osisRef="Ps.23.6" type="crossReference"><reference osisRef="Ps.21.4">Ps. 21:4</reference></note><w lemma="strong:H0753 strong:H03117">forever</w>.<note n="4" osisID="Ps.23.6!note.4" osisRef="Ps.23.6" subType="x-original" type="translation">Hebrew <hi type="italic">for length of days</hi></note><l eID="gen8380" level="2"/>  <lg eID="gen8372"/> <div eID="gen8358" type="section"/> <chapter eID="gen8357" osisID="Ps.23"/>
